Hi @jaime further updates from Darren below, can you please action these? thanks!

Please also note Darren's note about "unmute" on the mobile embed. From what I can find, here is how to remove it: https://help.vimeo.com/hc/en-us/articles/12426285089681-Embed-background-and-chromeless-videos

Hi Chriss,

With the 4 videos missing on the 'Courses' tab. Can we please use the 4 thumbnails bellow until we film new ones.

Thank You.

Ok can we put 'Tracie Astin & Melissa Wyness Fiddes Training Academy'
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aloF3sW5qNc

Hi Darren,

Thanks, we have tested the link and unfortunately we aren't able to embed the showcase in it's entirely. From our research, Vimeo doesn't appear to support this type of embed. 

The recommendation from here is to provide visitors with the option to view the showcase under the title. For example:

To view the full Fiddes series, click here. (with here linked to your Vimeo showcase). 

Please let me know your thoughts and we'll action accordingly.

Ok, lets see if this works, cheers.

https://vimeo.com/showcase/10748125
